snippet: The vast wasteland of television has been replaced by an excess of excellence that is fundamentally altering my media diet and threatening to consume my waking life in the process.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column on television's new golden age; says vast wasteland of television has been replaced by excess of excellence that is fundamentally altering media diets and threatening to consume waking life of viewers in the process.
lead_paragraph: The vast wasteland of television has been replaced by an excess of excellence that is fundamentally altering my media diet and threatening to consume my waking life in the process.

headline.main: Barely Keeping Up in TV’s New Golden Age
headline.print_headline: Barely Keeping Up in TV’s New Golden Age
